Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has been discussed before, but while searching for planet maps, I found the original open source map of Kerbin. Granted Kerbin is just a mirror image of the map.

None the less, could be interesting for anyone pondering home world activities in the future of the program

http://libnoise.sourceforge.net/examples/complexplanet/index.html

Map of the source planet:

http://libnoise.sourceforge.net/examples/complexplanet/images/planet.jpg

Kerbin for comparison:

http://www.majhost.com/gallery/borna123456/GTPlanet/kerbin_colour.png

Edited August 22, 2012 by NAMROG
